description: This file defines a UI component named SearchBar using the LightningJS framework. The component includes a template for rendering search input and a button, manages internal state, handles focus and input events, and invokes a callback when a search is triggered.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus event handler that updates focus state and placeholder/alpha values.

methods.name: unfocus
methods.description: Unfocus event handler that updates focus state and placeholder/alpha values.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles Enter key press, triggers onSearch callback with current input value.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Handles Backspace key press, deletes last character or defocuses.

methods.name: up
methods.description: Handles Up key press, moves focus to parent.

methods.name: down
methods.description: Handles Down key press, moves focus to parent.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Handles character input, appends characters to the search value.
